The project aims to explore the relationship between the COVID-19 and the US airline traffic<br>
[project](projectxyz.html)<br>
The main components:<br>
1.EDA exploring the statistical and distribution of the data<br>
2.Map showing the the geographical information<br>
3.Network showing the traffic volume of different origin and destination<br>
4.Time Series plot showing the trend over time<br>
5.Word Cloud plot of the 2020 tweets data<br>
